ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards and Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: And if we could convince Faras and Aloro to join the fold we would have all the E ci bards on this list within three guilds:-) Anyone know if Aloro is still on
ygData.messageBody:
And if we could convince Faras and Aloro to join the fold we would have all
the E'ci bards on this list within three guilds:-)

Anyone know if Aloro is still on this list? He used to post here quite a
bit. He still posts on The Concert Hall a lot so I know he still plays.
Same for John Kim (Kaearia on the Concert Hall).

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:29 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards and Enchanters


Heh heh, yeah that is definitely true. I have been in a lot of groups with
two bards and it is great. I'd love to get in a group with Galtin and you
sometime I think we would be very deadly. Although I think the enchanter
would have found that using his two very cheap stun spells would have even
made the slaughter more amusing. Three bards would definitely be a hoot,
good grief think of the clarity effects at 32! Three bards and two nukers
with an enchanter would be scary indeed. I don't think two many servers
have as many bards as we do on E'ci though. What guild are you in Gilgurth?
I know between DoH, Armigers, and Grail Brotherhood we have almost a dozen
bards over level 25.

Kitasi Faegehearper
Armigers of Mirth

-----Original Message-----
From: Daryl Schwemley [mailto:drs@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 2:27 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Bards and Enchanters


Since some people think we bards are very limited when grouped with bards, I
thought I would relate what happened to me Tuesday night.

When I logged in, two of my guildmates (bard and enchanter) were grouped
together with a warrior and another bard. I was invited to join them. So
our group was 3 bards, warrior, and enchanter. All of us bards were around
level 25, so it worked out where we actually had enough songs for all of us
to twist 3 songs each.

The enchanter was giving everyone alacrity, but other than that, he was just
medding. Why? There was nothing else for him to really do. He commented
on that at one point, and my fellow bard guildmate said, "Sit, med, enjoy
the ride!" ;-)

So, in this group, it wasn't the bard who was useless, it was the enchanter.
Just thought it was funny.

Gilgurth
Bard of 26 Winces
E'ci
